Articles.Content: Hello, when I try to launch my craft, my cursor turns rainbow and spins for about 15 seconds, and then the buttons at the top darken, and I'm unable to interact with anything in the game. I can't exit the VAB/SPH, I can't add/remove parts, I can't move parts, I can't change up the staging, and it's been really annoying. I'd appreciate some help.

Can I see any photos, anything that shows the situation?
I really don't know what you are talking about...

On 7/29/2021 at 3:07 AM, DaBaby Kerman said:

Hello, when I try to launch my craft, my cursor turns rainbow and spins for about 15 seconds, and then the buttons at the top darken, and I'm unable to interact with anything in the game. I can't exit the VAB/SPH, I can't add/remove parts, I can't move parts, I can't change up the staging, and it's been really annoying. I'd appreciate some help.
